participants.name: Paul Falkenbach
participants.title: VP Sales & Marketing at National Sign Systems

messages.message: Flagstaff is getting colder, and the snow season approaches all too quickly.  Last weekend it snowed about and inch and that is probably the earliest I have ever seen it.  School is keeping me busy, I hope to graduate sometime next year, but maybe I will stick around longer if I can get a tuition waiver.  Hows the family?  Hows work?  Going to have a position available for me when I am done here?
